title: How many Twilight books are there? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are four books in the series; Twilight, New Moon, Eclipse, and Breaking Dawn. However there are a few other books between the main four books: a novella; the short second life of bree tanner (which is about the life of a new-born vampire), a novel; Midnight Sun (a re-write of Twilight (the first book), except in Edward’s perspective), and Life and Death (another re-write of Twilight, however the gender’s are switched).

This depends on what you classify as a book because there is a lot of Electronic work out there but from what I am aware of there are the 4 main books Twilight, New moon, Eclipse and Breaking Dawn. There is the companion book the short life of Bree Tanner. There are the graphic novels. The official illustrated guide. Life and Death. I don’t know if Midnight Sun was ever made into an actual book but it is written by Meyers.
